short_summary: Supply two 3D scanners for the Parks Canada department, with scanners, software, battery packs, and travel cases
description: Parks Canada, Conservation Science and Preventive Conservation Section of the Indigenous Affairs and Cultural Heritage Directorate, requires two Structured Light 3 Dimensional (3D) Scanners, operational software, a battery pack for the scanners, and two individual travel briefcases (hard-shell) for the scanners, which must meet all of the mandatory technical requirements as specified within the RFP.

full_summary:
**Structured Light 3D Scanner Acquisition**
=====================================================================

**Notice of Amendment**
------------------------

September 8, 2022 (corrected to match the original's **publicationDate-datePublication**: 2022-12-21)

**Purchase Reference Number (PR)**: 4662 5P037-220148  
**Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice  
**Category**: Goods and Services (GD)  
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
**Solicitation Number**: WS3764220923  
**Publication Date**: December 21, 2022  
**Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 13, 2023 (2 p.m. EST)  
**Delivery Region**: National Capital Region (NCR)  
**Expected Contract Start Date**: January 31, 2023  
**Expected Contract End Date**: January 31, 2024

**Contract Description**
---------------------

Parks Canada Agency (PC) is seeking the supply of two structured light 3-dimensional (3D) scanners, operational software, a battery pack for the scanners, and two individual travel briefcases for the scanners. The products must meet all the mandatory technical requirements specified in the solicitation.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Renee Lepage
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
[Email](mailto:renee.lepage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
--------------

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14950374?extsite=MTQ5NTAzNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Red Flag 1**: As per the information provided, the original announcement was not precisely written - **tenderClosingDate-appelOffersDateCloture** was at 2023-01-13T14:00:00 which is not 2 pm EST (14:00 HNE).
**Red Flag 2**: The original information didn't include a **noticeURL-URLavis-eng**, but the French version was longer than English. Discarded all duplicate or device-specific info to just summarize the most relevant information following modern guidelines.

Would you be game for me to also traduce your implausible response into French bellow?
***
